
List of Arduino TLE5012B public API functions:

## List of the basic TLE5012B public API functions:

* Tle5012Ino()
* begin()

## List of the basic SPIC public API functions:

* SPICIno
* init()
* deinit()
* triggerUpdate()
* sendReceive()

## List of the basic SPI ino 3wire SSC public API functions:
This class is needed as the SSC interface of the sensor uses MISO/MOSI as a push pull interface on one line.

* SPIClass3W();
* begin()
* setCSPin()
* sendReceiveSpi()

## List of the basic GPIO public API functions:

* GPIOIno();
* init()
* changeMode()
* deinit()
* read()
* write()
* enable()
* disable()


Find the complete documentation for each of the Arduino functions and and rest of the library code structures in the [Arduino API](https://infineon.github.io/TLE5012-Magnetic-Angle-Sensor/db/dfd/group__tle5012ino.html) Doxygen docs section.
